items: The top bar has been re-arranged to give you more vertical space for the story map
Issues now open in a modal dialog and can be modified on the fly.
Fixed a bug that prevented maps from loading when an invalid quick filter was active
Our most requested feature is here: You can now manage multiple user story maps.

Introducing epic statistics: You can now see the progress of your issues within an epic. Toggle between
totals per status, percentage of issues per status completed or percentage of story points done.
Sub-task support: You can now display the number of subtasks on the issue card, alongside a link that reveals all subtasks and their status
